apl.apl: ['axiom-audit'] | where action == 'usageCalculated' | distinct ['resource.id'] | project key=['resource.id'], value=['resource.id'] | sort by key asc

['axiom-audit'] | where action == 'usageCalculated' | distinct tostring(['properties.dataset']) | project key=tostring(['properties.dataset']), value=tostring(['properties.dataset']) | sort by key asc

["axiom-audit"] | where action == "runAPLQueryCost" | extend User = case(isnotempty(["actor.email"]), ["actor.email"], isnotempty(["actor.name"]), strcat("[", ["actor.name"], "]"), "[unknown]") | distinct User | project key=User, value=User | sort by key asc

query.apl:
declare query_parameters (org_filter:string = "", dataset_filter:string = "");
['axiom-audit']
| where action == 'usageCalculated'
| where isempty(org_filter) or ['resource.id'] == org_filter
| where isempty(dataset_filter) or tostring(['properties.dataset']) == dataset_filter
| summarize total_bytes = sum(['properties.hourly_ingest_bytes'])
| extend ['Total'] = total_bytes / 1000000000
| project ['Total']

declare query_parameters (org_filter:string = "", dataset_filter:string = "");
['axiom-audit']
| where action == 'usageCalculated'
| where isempty(org_filter) or ['resource.id'] == org_filter
| where isempty(dataset_filter) or tostring(['properties.dataset']) == dataset_filter
| summarize total_bytes = sum(['properties.hourly_ingest_bytes']), day_count = dcount(bin(_time, 1d))
| extend days = iff(day_count == 0, 1.0, todouble(day_count))
| extend ['GB/day'] = round(total_bytes / days / 1000000000, 0)
| project ['GB/day']

declare query_parameters (org_filter:string = "", dataset_filter:string = "");
['axiom-audit']
| where action == 'usageCalculated'
| where isempty(org_filter) or ['resource.id'] == org_filter
| where isempty(dataset_filter) or tostring(['properties.dataset']) == dataset_filter
| summarize total_bytes = sum(['properties.hourly_ingest_bytes']), day_count = dcount(bin(_time, 1d))
| extend days = iff(day_count == 0, 1.0, todouble(day_count))
| extend daily_rate = total_bytes / days
| extend ['30d GB'] = round(daily_rate * 30 / 1000000000, 0)
| project ['30d GB']

declare query_parameters (org_filter:string = "", dataset_filter:string = "");
["axiom-audit"]
| where action == "usageCalculated"
| where isempty(org_filter) or ["resource.id"] == org_filter
| where isempty(dataset_filter) or tostring(["properties.dataset"]) == dataset_filter
| summarize ["GBÂ·ms"] = round(sum(["properties.hourly_billable_query_gbms"]), 0)
| project ["GBÂ·ms"]

declare query_parameters (org_filter:string = "", dataset_filter:string = "");
['axiom-audit']
| where _time between (ago(14d) .. now())
| where action == 'usageCalculated'
| where isempty(org_filter) or ['resource.id'] == org_filter
| where isempty(dataset_filter) or tostring(['properties.dataset']) == dataset_filter
| summarize this_week = sumif(['properties.hourly_ingest_bytes'], _time >= ago(7d)), last_week = sumif(['properties.hourly_ingest_bytes'], _time < ago(7d) and _time >= ago(14d))
| extend ['WoW %'] = iff(last_week == 0, real(null), round(100.0 * (this_week - last_week) / last_week, 1))
| project ['WoW %']

declare query_parameters (org_filter:string = "", dataset_filter:string = "");
['axiom-audit']
| where action == 'usageCalculated'
| where isempty(org_filter) or ['resource.id'] == org_filter
| where isempty(dataset_filter) or tostring(['properties.dataset']) == dataset_filter
| summarize ingest_gb = sum(['properties.hourly_ingest_bytes']) / 1000000000, query_mgbms = sum(['properties.hourly_billable_query_gbms']) / 1000000 by dataset = tostring(['properties.dataset'])
| where ingest_gb > 100
| extend util_score = round(query_mgbms / (ingest_gb + 0.001), 3)
| where util_score < 0.02
| summarize ['Count'] = count()

declare query_parameters (org_filter:string = "", dataset_filter:string = "");
['axiom-audit']
| where action == 'usageCalculated'
| where isempty(org_filter) or ['resource.id'] == org_filter
| where isempty(dataset_filter) or tostring(['properties.dataset']) == dataset_filter
| summarize ['Datasets'] = dcount(['properties.dataset'])

declare query_parameters (org_filter:string = "", dataset_filter:string = "");
['axiom-audit']
| where action == 'usageCalculated'
| where isempty(org_filter) or ['resource.id'] == org_filter
| where isempty(dataset_filter) or tostring(['properties.dataset']) == dataset_filter
| summarize ['Ingest GB'] = round(sum(['properties.hourly_ingest_bytes']) / 1000000000, 1) by bin(_time, 1d)

queryOptions.editorContent:
declare query_parameters (org_filter:string = "", dataset_filter:string = "");
['axiom-audit']
| where action == 'usageCalculated'
| where isempty(org_filter) or ['resource.id'] == org_filter
| where isempty(dataset_filter) or tostring(['properties.dataset']) == dataset_filter
| summarize ['Ingest GB'] = round(sum(['properties.hourly_ingest_bytes']) / 1000000000, 1) by bin(_time, 1d)

query.apl:
declare query_parameters (org_filter:string = "", dataset_filter:string = "");
["axiom-audit"]
| where action == "usageCalculated"
| where isempty(org_filter) or ["resource.id"] == org_filter
| where isempty(dataset_filter) or tostring(["properties.dataset"]) == dataset_filter
| summarize ["GB"] = round(sum(["properties.hourly_ingest_bytes"]) / 1000000000, 1) by bin(_time, 1d), Dataset = tostring(["properties.dataset"])

declare query_parameters (org_filter:string = "", dataset_filter:string = "");
["axiom-audit"]
| where action == "usageCalculated"
| where isempty(org_filter) or ["resource.id"] == org_filter
| where isempty(dataset_filter) or tostring(["properties.dataset"]) == dataset_filter
| summarize ingest_gb = round(sum(["properties.hourly_ingest_bytes"]) / 1000000000, 1), query_gbms = round(sum(["properties.hourly_billable_query_gbms"]), 0) by Dataset = tostring(["properties.dataset"])
| extend ["Util Score"] = round(query_gbms / (ingest_gb * 1000000000 + 0.001), 6)
| top 15 by ingest_gb
| project Dataset, ["Ingest GB"] = ingest_gb, ["Query GBÂ·ms"] = query_gbms, ["Util Score"]

declare query_parameters (org_filter:string = "", dataset_filter:string = "");
["axiom-audit"]
| where action == "usageCalculated"
| where isempty(org_filter) or ["resource.id"] == org_filter
| where isempty(dataset_filter) or tostring(["properties.dataset"]) == dataset_filter
| summarize ingest_gb = round(sum(["properties.hourly_ingest_bytes"]) / 1000000000, 1), query_gbms = round(sum(["properties.hourly_billable_query_gbms"]), 0) by Dataset = tostring(["properties.dataset"])
| where ingest_gb > 100
| extend util_score = round(query_gbms / (ingest_gb * 1000000000 + 0.001), 6)
| where util_score < 0.00002
| extend savings_50 = round(ingest_gb * 0.5, 0), savings_drop = round(ingest_gb, 0)
| top 10 by ingest_gb
| project Dataset, ["Ingest GB"] = ingest_gb, ["Util Score"] = util_score, ["Savings 50%"] = savings_50, ["Savings Drop"] = savings_drop

declare query_parameters (org_filter:string = "", dataset_filter:string = "");
["axiom-audit"]
| where action == "usageCalculated"
| where isempty(org_filter) or ["resource.id"] == org_filter
| where isempty(dataset_filter) or tostring(["properties.dataset"]) == dataset_filter
| summarize ingest_gb = round(sum(["properties.hourly_ingest_bytes"]) / 1000000000, 1), query_gbms = round(sum(["properties.hourly_billable_query_gbms"]), 0), datasets = dcount(["properties.dataset"]) by Org = ["resource.id"]
| extend util_score = round(query_gbms / (ingest_gb * 1000000000 + 0.001), 6)
| top 10 by ingest_gb
| project Org, ["Ingest GB"] = ingest_gb, ["Query GBÂ·ms"] = query_gbms, Datasets = datasets, ["Util Score"] = util_score

charts.name: Cost Optimization Actions
charts.text:
## ðŸš¨ Cost Control Playbook

### Immediate Actions
1. **Top Ingest Movers** â†’ Find what changed this week
2. **Waste Candidates** â†’ High ingest, near-zero queries = drop/sample
3. **Savings columns** â†’ Prioritize by impact

### Optimization Tactics
| Pattern | Action |
|---------|--------|
| High ingest, ~0 queries | Drop at source or sample 90% |
| High ingest, some queries | Split: keep errors, drop debug |
| Sudden spike | Check deploy/feature flag |
| Growing WoW | Add rate limiting at source |

### Key Metrics
- **Util Score < 0.00002 (or Work/GB < 100)** = Waste candidate
- **WoW > 25%** = Investigate immediately

query.apl:
declare query_parameters (org_filter:string = "", dataset_filter:string = "");
["axiom-audit"]
| where action == "usageCalculated"
| where isempty(org_filter) or ["resource.id"] == org_filter
| where isempty(dataset_filter) or tostring(["properties.dataset"]) == dataset_filter
| summarize ["GBÂ·ms"] = round(sum(["properties.hourly_billable_query_gbms"]), 0) by bin(_time, 1d)

declare query_parameters (org_filter:string = "", dataset_filter:string = "");
["axiom-audit"]
| where action == "usageCalculated"
| where isempty(org_filter) or ["resource.id"] == org_filter
| where isempty(dataset_filter) or tostring(["properties.dataset"]) == dataset_filter
| summarize ["GBÂ·ms"] = round(sum(["properties.hourly_billable_query_gbms"]), 0) by bin(_time, 1d), Dataset = tostring(["properties.dataset"])

declare query_parameters (org_filter:string = "", dataset_filter:string = "");
["axiom-audit"]
| where _time between (ago(14d) .. now())
| where action == "usageCalculated"
| where isempty(org_filter) or ["resource.id"] == org_filter
| where isempty(dataset_filter) or tostring(["properties.dataset"]) == dataset_filter
| summarize this_week = sumif(["properties.hourly_ingest_bytes"], _time >= ago(7d)), last_week = sumif(["properties.hourly_ingest_bytes"], _time < ago(7d) and _time >= ago(14d)) by Dataset = tostring(["properties.dataset"])
| extend delta_gb = (this_week - last_week) / 1000000000
| extend ["This Week GB"] = round(this_week / 1000000000, 1), ["Last Week GB"] = round(last_week / 1000000000, 1)
| extend ["Delta GB"] = round(delta_gb, 1)
| extend ["Delta %"] = iff(last_week == 0, 100.0, round(100.0 * (this_week - last_week) / last_week, 1))
| where delta_gb > 10
| top 10 by delta_gb
| project Dataset, ["This Week GB"], ["Last Week GB"], ["Delta GB"], ["Delta %"]

declare query_parameters (org_filter:string = "", dataset_filter:string = "", user_filter:string = "");
["axiom-audit"]
| where action == "runAPLQueryCost"
| where isempty(org_filter) or ["resource.id"] == org_filter
| extend User = case(isnotempty(["actor.email"]), ["actor.email"], isnotempty(["actor.name"]), strcat("[", ["actor.name"], "]"), isnotempty(["actor.userAgent"]), strcat("[", ["actor.userAgent"], "]"), isnotempty(["actor.id"]), strcat("[id:", substring(["actor.id"], 0, 8), "]"), isnotempty(source), strcat("[source:", source, "]"), "[unknown]")
| where isempty(user_filter) or User == user_filter
| summarize query_cost = sum(["properties.query_cost_gbms"]), queries = count() by User
| top 10 by query_cost
| project User, ["Cost GBÂ·ms"] = round(query_cost, 0), Queries = queries

declare query_parameters (org_filter:string = "", dataset_filter:string = "", user_filter:string = "");
["axiom-audit"]
| where action == "runAPLQueryCost"
| where ["properties.query_cost_gbms"] > 0
| where isempty(org_filter) or ["resource.id"] == org_filter
| extend User = case(isnotempty(["actor.email"]), ["actor.email"], isnotempty(["actor.name"]), strcat("[", ["actor.name"], "]"), isnotempty(["actor.userAgent"]), strcat("[", ["actor.userAgent"], "]"), isnotempty(["actor.id"]), strcat("[id:", substring(["actor.id"], 0, 8), "]"), isnotempty(source), strcat("[source:", source, "]"), "[unknown]")
| where isempty(user_filter) or User == user_filter
| top 10 by ["properties.query_cost_gbms"]
| project User, ["Cost GBÂ·ms"] = round(["properties.query_cost_gbms"], 0), Query = substring(["properties.queryString"], 0, 100)

declare query_parameters (org_filter:string = "", dataset_filter:string = "", user_filter:string = "");
["axiom-audit"]
| where action == "runAPLQueryCost"
| where isempty(org_filter) or ["resource.id"] == org_filter
| extend User = case(isnotempty(["actor.email"]), ["actor.email"], isnotempty(["actor.name"]), strcat("[", ["actor.name"], "]"), isnotempty(["actor.userAgent"]), strcat("[", ["actor.userAgent"], "]"), isnotempty(["actor.id"]), strcat("[id:", substring(["actor.id"], 0, 8), "]"), isnotempty(source), strcat("[source:", source, "]"), "[unknown]")
| where isempty(user_filter) or User == user_filter
| summarize Queries = count() by bin(_time, 1d), User

description: Usage monitoring dashboard for tracking ingest volume, query costs, burn rate projections, and waste identification. Filter by org, dataset, or user to scope analysis.
name: Org Usage & Cost Control
